title: Diagnose Misconfigured VLAN
description: A new device on the network cannot get an IP address. The agent suspects it was placed in the wrong VLAN.

tasks.description: Get the MAC address of the new device and the switch port it is connected to.
Check the configuration of the switch port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the port is configured for the 'guest' VLAN instead of the 'corporate' VLAN.

tasks.description: Change the VLAN configuration on the port to the correct 'corporate' VLAN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the port configuration.
